metadata.title: Product Detail Page Vision Walkthrough
metadata.description: Show how the storefront agent narrates the PDP refresh with supporting UI snippets.

steps.speaker: Jamie (PM)
steps.message: Riley, can you give our VP the high-level story for the PDP redesign?

steps.speaker: Riley (Agent)
steps.message: Absolutely. Here's the discovery context we use to open the conversation.

steps.speaker: Jamie (PM)
steps.message: They will want to click through assets. Can you surface the quick links?

steps.speaker: Riley (Agent)
steps.message: Of course. These are the three references we highlight in the meeting.

steps.speaker: Jamie (PM)
steps.message: What's our personalization angle once this ships?

steps.speaker: Riley (Agent)
steps.message: We emphasize the adaptive hero and the experiments queued up next.

steps.speaker: Jamie (PM)
steps.message: Great. Close with who owns the launch tasks.

steps.speaker: Riley (Agent)
steps.message: Here's the action list we're tracking for leadership.
